hero.headline: Cut Property {{highlight}} Costs by 40%
hero.subheading: Streamline work orders, automate scheduling, and gain complete visibility into your property maintenance operations with our all-in-one platform.

benefits.title: Why Property Managers Choose Us
benefits.subtitle: Transform your maintenance operations with powerful features designed specifically for property management professionals.

items.title: Save 15+ Hours Weekly
items.description: Automate work order creation, scheduling, and vendor communication to focus on strategic decisions.

items.title: Reduce Costs by 40%
items.description: Prevent costly emergency repairs with predictive maintenance and optimized vendor pricing.

items.title: Real-Time Analytics
items.description: Get instant insights into maintenance trends, costs, and performance across all properties.

items.title: Ensure Compliance
items.description: Stay compliant with safety regulations and maintain detailed audit trails automatically.

items.title: Vendor Management
items.description: Centralize vendor relationships, track performance, and negotiate better rates with data.

items.title: Mobile-First Design
items.description: Manage properties on-the-go with our intuitive mobile app for iOS and Android.

items.title: Smart Scheduling
items.description: AI-powered scheduling optimizes technician routes and minimizes tenant disruption.

items.title: Digital Documentation
items.description: Store photos, receipts, and reports in one place with automatic organization.

videoSection.title: See How It Works
videoSection.subtitle: Watch a 2-minute demo of our platform in action

section.title: What Our Customers Say
section.subtitle: Join hundreds of property managers who've transformed their operations

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.title: Property Manager
testimonials.quote: This platform has revolutionized how we handle maintenance. We've cut our response time by 60% and our tenants are happier than ever.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.title: Operations Director
testimonials.quote: The cost savings have been incredible. We've reduced our maintenance budget by 40% while actually improving service quality.

testimonials.name: Lisa Rodriguez
testimonials.title: Portfolio Manager
testimonials.quote: The mobile app is a game-changer. I can manage work orders from anywhere and keep track of all our properties in real-time.
